title: Acacetin ameliorates pressure overload-induced cardiac remodeling by targeting USP10 and inhibiting maladaptive cardiomyocyte autophagy.
abstract: Numerous drugs have been developed to meet the critical demand for treatments inhibiting cardiac remodeling following cardiovascular disease. Acacetin is a flavonoid with potential therapeutic effects against various cardiovascular diseases.
journal: Phytomedicine : international journal of phytotherapy and phytopharmacology
